name: Vegetarian Black Bean And Sweet Potato Tacos Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: sweet potato, olive oil, kosher salt, ground black pepper, corn tortilla, black beans, pico de gallo, avocado, fresh cilantro
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup diced sweet potato (⅓ of a sweet potato)
¼ cup canned black beans, drained and rinsed
¼ cup pico de gallo (see recipe)
recipeInstructionSteps: Toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium microwave-safe bowl, and microwave until tender, about 2 minutes.
Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet over low heat and fill with cooked sweet potatoes, black the beans, pico de gallo, and avocado. Garnish with cilantro.
